question: The UN Security Council has expressed concern over the military coup in which country?
explanation:
The United Nations Security Council (UNSC) has expressed concern over the military coup in Myanmar.
The United Kingdom, which is the President of the UNSC for this month, also backed the discussion on the issue. The UNSC asked the Military rulers for the release of all the detainees including the State Counsellor Aung San Suu Kyi and President.
